alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 12:29PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches in the valleys and 7 to 12 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...Eastport, Pinehurst, St. Maries, Fourth Of July Pass, Kellogg, Mullan, Clark Fork, Athol, Priest River, Osburn, Bonners Ferry, Dobson Pass, Lookout Pass, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Wallace, Fernwood, and Sandpoint. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.
